Having never seen a fever that's virtually resistant to all known

Summary:
Alone in the Arizona Territory following her husband's tragic and

book_title: Gypsy Jewel
Summary:
Determined to track down the notorious Jesse James, Jewel catches the

book_title: Ghouls
Summary:
The sleepy town of Tylersville, Maryland, has become the haunting

book_title: Switchback
Summary:
Dorothea attends a film retrospective of her movie career and, having

book_title: Operation High Dragon (Warbots, No 5)
Summary:
An unknown enemy has armed America's polar-orbit military

book_title: Hypoglycemia: The Disease Your Doctor Won't Treat
Summary:
Explains what causes low blood sugar, shows how proper nutrition can

book_title: Vampire Nights
Summary:
Curious to know where Tom, her live-in lover, goes night after night,

book_title: Night Glow
Summary:
Only in the depths of sleep would family man William Myers experience

book_title: The Patron
Summary:
Seemingly on death's doorstep, Hollywood mogul Miles Cort battles

book_title: The Shapechanger
Summary:
A planned summer idyl on Smoke Island becomes, for Kate and her

book_title: Black Bitches Dancing With Charlie
Summary:
Sergeant Robert Johnson does such a good job training jungle fighters

book_title: Shattered Lullabies
Summary:
Melanie Wyatt awakens from a dream to find that her baby is dead and

book_title: Azarius
Summary:
In the small town of Ainsley, Louisiana, a terrible evil has been let

book_title: Love, Forever More
Summary:
Serena Foster's affairs with young Rory Clendenning and ruggedly

book_title: The Jihad Ultimatum
Summary:
Three Iranian terrorists infiltrate the United States, and with the

book_title: Brain Fever
Summary:
After waking up in an unfamiliar place, Adam Reynolds struggles to

book_title: Working
Summary:
No one understands the day-to-day existence of a working girl better

book_title: Winter Palace
Summary:
In the dawn of a new era of repression in the U.S.S.R., the Soviet

book_title: The Dublin Affair
Summary:
Guy Ryan inherits control of Rytech, a billion dollar defense

book_title: Control
Summary:
Street-smart investigative journalist Bert Stouffer has some questions

book_title: The Gilgul
Summary:
The day of a wedding--ostensibly the happiest day of a person's

book_title: Code Mobius
Summary:
Mike Antoon leaves for Scotland on an official courier assignment for

book_title: Scorpion's Dance

book_title: The Beauty Queen Killer

book_title: Death Spore
Summary:
Jane Wilson's experiment in growing gigantic edible mushrooms

book_title: Love's Wildest Promise
Summary:
Young Sarah Moody lived a boring life until she was abducted and

book_title: Carousel

After the Civil War, Daniel O'Brien returns to work for his best

book_title: Love's Daring Dream
Summary:
Maggie fled the poverty and shame of her family's bleak existence

book_title: Ricochet
Summary:
Vietnam veteran Frank Conti swears vengeance upon the Atlantic City

book_title: Mind Stealer

Out in the middle of the North Carolina woods for a corporate training

book_title: Georgina
Summary:
Having been banished to Ireland by her grandmother, Lady Mercer, for

book_title: Family Closets
Summary: FICTION-SUSPENSE/PSYCHOLOGICAL

book_title: The Twelfth Child
Summary: FICTION-OCCULT

book_title: Castle of the Heart
The Wild Type
Summary: FICTION-SUSPENSE/PSYCHOLOGICAL

book_title: Vampire Winter
Summary:
For vampire Blaine Kettridge, the cold, dark nuclear winter is the

book_title: What Does Joan Say?: My Seven Years As White House Astrologer to Nancy and Ronald Reagan
Summary:

book_title: Embrace the Flame
Summary:

Their bodies bear the bloody marks of the killer's sadistic

When Brion's dog, Whisper, is hit by a car, ancient magic from a

The first title in a new historical trilogy, featuring the three

book_title: The White Puma
Summary:
As two riders make their way across the North American wilderness in

book_title: In a Father's Rage

An account of the murder of Teresa Taylor describes how drug abuse,

book_title: Asimov on Science: A 30-Year Retrospective

book_title: I Know My First Name Is Steven
Summary:
Tells how convicted child molester Kenneth Eugene Parnell abducted

book_title: Medical Murderers: From the Files of True Detective Magazine

book_title: Wild Tory Rose
Summary:
Meg was born into poverty and servitude on a vast estate in 18th-

book_title: Louisiana Heat (Magnolia Road)

book_title: Code Blue

book_title: Canyon Passage

book_title: Moondust and Madness

book_author: League of Women Voters of California Education Fund

book_title: Destiny
Summary:

book_title: Sex in the Future : The Reproductive Revolution and How it Will Change Us

book_title: Juggling the Stars

--spinning a tale of intrigue, sabotage, & murder.
